Question: This person won more matches (1,337) than any other male professional tennis player in the open era.
Hints: In 1984, this person switched to the new Wilson ProStaff that had been designed especially for him.
This person grew up in Belleville, Illinois, across the Mississippi River from St.
This person reached the semifinals or better of a tennis major a total of 31 times, a record recently surpassed by Roger Federer.
